info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 10:56PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Eddy and northwestern Culberson Counties through 1245 AM CDT/1145 PM MDT/... At 1156 PM CDT/1056 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Guadalupe Mountains National Park, or 11 miles northwest of Pine Springs, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Springs, Guadalupe Mountains National Park, McKittrick Canyon and Carlsbad Caverns National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
